column4: I didn't see you mention it, sorry... don't want to step on your toes if you're following along  :)
No problem. If you have other ideas for him please share. :)
That should be all he needs once he's configured NetworkManager correctly... shadowpool: have you gone into System > Administration > Network and ensured all settings are correct?
shadowblade said he couldn't even do a iwlist scan though, so setting Network manager isn't going to help I think.
